notes: Second-generation Pacifica minivan. Replaced the Chrysler Town & Country. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chrysler Pacifica (minivan) article, October 13, 2025 revision.

Second-generation Pacifica minivan, plug-in hybrid variant. First minivan with a PHEV drivetrain. 16 kWh lithium-ion battery with 33 miles electric range. Not available with AWD, 8-passenger seating, or Stow 'n Go. Difficulty modifier 1.4 due to high-voltage EV components. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chrysler Pacifica (minivan) article, October 13, 2025 revision.
Second generation Chrysler 300. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chrysler 300 article, October 13, 2025 revision.
First generation Chrysler 200, a re-engineered and restyled version of the Chrysler Sebring. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chrysler 200 article, October 13, 2025 revision.
Second generation Chrysler 200. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chrysler 200 article, October 13, 2025 revision.
Fifth generation Chrysler Town & Country. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chrysler Town & Country article, October 13, 2025 revision.

Sold as the Lancia Voyager in Continental Europe. Rebadged version of the Chrysler Grand Voyager. Difficulty modifier 1.1 due to diesel engine. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lancia Voyager article, October 13, 2025 revision.
